name: Smart Credit Card Selector
description: Consumer-grade prompt for selecting best cashback credit card

request.base_prompt:
Smart Credit‑Card Selector
================================
Context
I need a new cashback credit card for everyday spending in the U S.
Paste any card marketing copy or comparison tables you already have below;
if empty, run [LOOKUP("best US cashback cards 2025")].

<PASTE CARD INFO HERE IF YOU HAVE IT, OTHERWISE LEAVE BLANK>

Task
1. Build a table of the five cards with highest overall reward value. Include:
   • Issuer + card name
   • Annual fee
   • Effective cashback % on groceries, gas, dining, "other"
   • APR range
   • Top perk (≤ 6 words)
2. Score each card using this weight vector:
   groceries 40 %, gas 20 %, dining 20 %, other 10 %, perks 10 %.
3. Self‑Consistency
   • Draft two independent rankings (Rank A, Rank B) at temp = 0.7.
   • Vote: if top cards disagree, justify the tie‑breaker in ≤ 40 words.
4. Output
   a) **Exec‑Digest** line (≤ 120 chars)
   b) Final ranking table (markdown) with weighted score column
   c) Tie‑breaker note (if any)
5. Self‑Evaluation
   Complete the rubric below (fill the *'s):

| Criterion | Score (0‑1) | Evidence |
|-----------|-------------|----------|
| Data currency (≥ 2024) | * | * |
| Calculation accuracy | * | * |
| Bias disclosure | * | * |
